body.name: 3-in-1 Portable Fan, 4 Speeds Handheld Fan, Personal Fan with Foldable Handle as Desk Fan, Lightweight Neck Fan with Rope, Rechargeable Mini Fan for Stylish Girl/Women/Men/Pets/Indoor Outdoor/Travel

features: 🆒[3-in-1 Fan for Multiple Needs] The portable fan with bendable handle is versatile to be used almost anywhere.(Our 1 fan=Handheld fan+Desk fan+Neck fan). Thanks to the foldable handle design, this personal fan fits easily in hand and can be folded up for better storage or as a desk fan on a flat surface. The provided rope makes it easy to hang this neck fan around your neck when your hands are not free. Any way you choose to use this cooling fan, you can effortlessly enjoy an instant breeze.

🔋[Enjoy Tailored Breeze Without Interruption] This mini fan has 4 speeds with a 7-blade design to enhance airflow and minimize noise. Powered by rechargeable batteries that have up to 15 hours of usage time per charge (Depending on the speed you're using). Whether you're suffering from hot flashes/night sweats/heat intolerant/menopause or want to keep cool in summer, this portable mini outdoor fan can be a comfort summer essentials for you, makeing summer even more enjoyable.

🧊[Travel Essentials for All Day Cooling] This ultra-compact small fan measures a mere 4 in tall and 3 in wide, it's similar to most of today's smartphones. This mini fan can be easily tossed in your carry-on, purse, beach bag, fanny pack, or backpack to add comfort to all kinds of hot-weather occasions, from amusement park trips to concerts and sports games. With multiple 5 color options, you can find one that compliments your wardrobe and still enjoy the cooling benefits of the personal fan.

✨[2023 Upgraded Makeup Pre/ Skincare/Eyelash Fan] With 180° foldable new design, creative stylish look, high-quality material, this portable fan has a solid structure and is pressure-resistant. The handle on this fan can be folded down to become a base, which means you can easily set it on your table to get a cool breeze fast. The fan is the great addition to the nightly skincare routine for faster absorption and as a perfect cooling fan to decrease the drying time of nail, lash glue, eyelash.

🎁[Top Choice for Summer Gifts] The portable fan is a well-appreciated summer gift for those that just cannot bear the heat or the outdoor enthusiasts such as camping, cycle, climbing, travel, fishing and avid runners. May them be embraced by the cool breeze, this personal fan is the best gifts for Birthday, Anniversary, Mother's Day, Father's Day. Come with a one-year warranty, if you have any issue of our fan, please contact us without hesitation, we will take serious in any voices of you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My saving grace in this 100+ degree Texas weather!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the portable chargeable fan in the color pink, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. Living in Texas, where temperatures soar above 100 degrees, staying cool can seem impossible. This fan, however, has proven to be an absolute lifesaver during this scorching summer!I also bring it when I go to concerts and shows, and the battery lasts over 3 hours. Im not sure of the maximum battery life but it does last long enough to get me through the concerts at least!The compact and lightweight design makes it incredibly easy to carry around. I can slip it into my bag or even hold it in my hand without feeling any strain. The fact that it's chargeable is a GAME CHANGER! I no longer have to worry about constantly buying and replacing batteries.Pros:It is my favorite shade of pinkCompact and lightweight designLong-lasting battery lifeA powerful yet quiet breezeCons: None – this fan has truly been a lifesaver in the Texas heat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has 6 speeds and I use it on speed 2 and its enough for me. Battery lasts 8-10 hrs at least. I took it to Disney world in Florida and it was a life saver! The color is cute too. Got the blue one and it looks a bit lighter than in pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you run hot, this portable fan is perfect for you!
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use, rechargeable and the charge last a long time! I get soooo hot and I need a small fan to keep me cool. This fan is perfect. Load of speeds, easy to carry, can keep on a desk or hang around your neck. Perfect answer to a hot day. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT battery operated
reviews.reviewText: I should have read reviews on this before buying. Don't get me wrong, it's great. Cools effectively, very quiet and is rechargeable. The problem for me is that I actually wanted a battery operated fan. I'm keeping this because I can always use these, and I'll buy a battery one too In the description under Power source, it says battery operated. So I looked no further. I gave it for stars for inaccurate description. But that's the only issue for me. Most people probably want rechargeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This fan works great!
reviews.reviewText: I love the power this little fan has! With several settings and being rechargeable as well as handheld and a cord to connect if you'd like to hang it, this fan is super easy to use & very convenient in the summer heat! Such a great price for the quality!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the first fan as a birthday present for my sister. I opened it up before sending and loved it, so I ended up ordering 2 more for my husband and me. It's great when sitting outside, the breeze from the fan is pretty powerful for the size, and bonus: the breeze helps keeps the mosquitos away! I also use mine when I'm at my workbench in the garage. The portability makes it great for travel too! Don't hesitate to buy one (or more!), great product at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Fan
reviews.reviewText: The fan is cute and works well. It has 4 speeds from very light breeze to a fairly strong breeze. The fan is easilyAnd quickly charged via USB. The clip and ribbon allow it to be worn on the body but it falls at an awkwardangle and the clip requires some threading to attach to the fan, which is a bit tedious. Clip design could bemore user friendly. Overall, a good product, much as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only a few uses
reviews.reviewText: I loved it! But it stopped working after a while. Just started blinking no matter how much I charge it. It was super lightweight and cute
